html: "We all grieve for Cindy and the family, they will continue to be in our prayers. And lastly, I do believe that is what Timothy had in mind when he wrote, “I have fought the good fight, I have finished the race, I have kept the faith.” So we say, thank you @SenJohnMcCain."
text: "We all grieve for Cindy and the family, they will continue to be in our prayers. And lastly, I do believe that is what Timothy had in mind when he wrote, “I have fought the good fight, I have finished the race, I have kept the faith.” So we say, thank you @SenJohnMcCain."

html: "We all have our John McCain story—a time when we were moved by his stubbornness, his courage, or his passion –sometimes all three at the same time. I look forward to hearing these stories and tributes from my good friends."
text: "We all have our John McCain story—a time when we were moved by his stubbornness, his courage, or his passion –sometimes all three at the same time. I look forward to hearing these stories and tributes from my good friends."

html: "John served his country faithfully for 60 years. We owe him a great debt for that service. This week we will mourn him. We will honor him. And we will celebrate the truly remarkable life of an American hero."
text: "John served his country faithfully for 60 years. We owe him a great debt for that service. This week we will mourn him. We will honor him. And we will celebrate the truly remarkable life of an American hero."

html: "He was a patriot and always faithful. We all know that patriotism and loyalty to your country isn’t based on your words. You have to live it. And of course, @SenJohnMcCain did that every day."
text: "He was a patriot and always faithful. We all know that patriotism and loyalty to your country isn’t based on your words. You have to live it. And of course, @SenJohnMcCain did that every day."

html: "... I know and anybody else who served with him [knows] that he was always for the underdog, always for the troops out in the field... He would always take care of the Soldier, the Sailor, the Airman, the Marine."
text: "... I know and anybody else who served with him [knows] that he was always for the underdog, always for the troops out in the field... He would always take care of the Soldier, the Sailor, the Airman, the Marine."

html: "...he was a fighter and never shied away from a good fight. He was passionate for the causes that he believed in, a strong advocate for human rights and democratic values—standing up for oppressed people around the world."
text: "...he was a fighter and never shied away from a good fight. He was passionate for the causes that he believed in, a strong advocate for human rights and democratic values—standing up for oppressed people around the world."

html: "And then you always have heroes that you deal with and we are dealing with a hero when we deal with Sen. McCain...I think Timothy, when he wrote 2 Timothy 4:7 had John McCain in mind when he said 'I have fought the good fight, I have finished the race, I have kept the faith.'"
text: "And then you always have heroes that you deal with and we are dealing with a hero when we deal with Sen. McCain...I think Timothy, when he wrote 2 Timothy 4:7 had John McCain in mind when he said 'I have fought the good fight, I have finished the race, I have kept the faith.'"
